Class EnhancedBidHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.BidHistory
      • parties.in4010.q12015.group7.EnhancedBidHistory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EnhancedBidHistory
extends BidHistory
    Enhancement of the default BidHistory which in addition keeps record of the distance of every bid compared to the previous bid.
    Author:
    svanbekhoven
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void add(BidDetails details)

      • distance

        public double distance(Bid bid1,
              Bid bid2)
        Calculates the distance between two bids
        Parameters:
        bid1 -
        bid2 -
        Returns:
        distance = (number of differing issues between bid1 and bid2) / (number of issues)
